Constructor Detail

FingerInfo

FingerInfo(java.lang.String hostName,
           java.lang.String userName,
           java.lang.String homeDirectory,
           java.lang.String workingDirectory,
           java.lang.String architecture,
           java.lang.String osName,
           java.lang.String osVersion,
           java.lang.String javaVersion,
           java.util.Date localTime)
A constructor.

Parameters:
hostName - FQDN of the interrogated host.
userName - the user's account name.
homeDirectory - the path to the user's home directory.
workingDirectory - path to the working directory?
architecture - the host's CPU architecture identifier
osName - the identifier of the operating system running on the host.
osVersion - the version number of the operating system.
javaVersion - the version of the Java Virtual Machine.
localTime - the local time at the moment of the interrogation
